adjectives.description: neurasthenic (comparative more neurasthenic, superlative most neurasthenic)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to neurasthenia; that is, tendencies of a person who has suffered a nervous breakdown.
examples: They agreed to have no more family gatherings due to their father's neurasthenic presence.

entries.meaning: (medicine, psychiatry, dated) An individual who has neurasthenia.
